Name: Fairy Biography
About the game: Game Background: Recently, a group of spirits have been sealed in the ancient painting volume fled, They go around doing evil, the world is in danger! As guardians of the scroll, re-seal the spirits inside the scroll to keep people safe. No time to explain, Ride your horse and start now! Gameplay introduction: Players qualify for the game by using a paintbrush to enclose the mischievous spirits into the Elder Scrolls., Unlock collect different kinds of beauty spirits. Game features: Beautiful realistic painting style 10 beautiful CG Multiple interactive gameplay Skip (don't use) Thank you for your support of Lovely Games Studio.
